amendment.description: Amendment offered as a substitute to the Neumann amendment (A001) sought to reduce the appropriation for Members' Representational Allowances by $4.6 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 2 in House Rept. 104-146, as a substitute to the Neumann amendment to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for Members official mail expenses by $4.6 million.

action.text: Substitute (A002) offered by Mr. Castle to the Neumann amendment (A001).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castle amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 215 (Roll no. 402).
